full_summary:
### M5000-245106 - 5.8m Patrol Boats

#### Solicitation Information

*   ***Contract Number:*** `WS4574856789-Doc4597651581`
*   ***Amendment Number:*** 2
*   ***Solicitation Number:*** `WS4574856789`
*   ***Publication Date:*** `2024-05-27`
*   ***Tender Closing Date:*** `2024-06-25T14:00:00`
*   ***Amendment Date:*** `2024-06-18`

#### Contract Details

*   ***Expected Contract Start Date:*** `2024-07-31`
*   ***Expected Contract End Date:*** Not Specified
*   ***Tender Status:*** Expiring

#### Procurement Information

*   ***Procurement Category:*** `GD` (General Defense)
*   ***Notice Type:*** Request for Proposal
*   ***Procurement Method:*** Competitive-Selective Tendering
*   ***Selection Criteria:*** Lowest Price
*   ***Trade Agreements:*** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   ***Regions of Opportunity:*** N/A
*   ***Regions of Delivery:*** Saskatchewan, Alberta, Manitoba

#### Contracting Entity Information

*   ***Contracting Entity Name:*** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   ***Contracting Entity Address:*** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End User Information

*   ***End User Name:*** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
*   ***End User Address:*** 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1AOR2, Canada

#### Contact Information

*   ***Contact Name:*** Parsons, Mary (SPAC/PSPC)
*   ***Contact Email:*** mary.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Request for Proposal Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for the fabrication and supply of four (4) 5.8 meter, aluminum welded boats, with trailers, with delivery to Edmonton, AB and Regina, SK, by June 1, 2025. There is also an optional requirement for an additional eight (8) 5.8 meter, aluminum welded boats, with trailers, with delivery to Winnipeg, MB. This
